amendment.description: Amendment to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct outreach to Historically Black Colleges and Universities; Hispanic Serving Institutions; Native American Colleges; and rural Colleges to ensure that health professionals from underrepresented populations are aware of research opportunities under this Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 8 printed in House Report 114-193 to direct the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct outreach to Historically Black Colleges and Universities; Hispanic Serving Institutions; Native American Colleges; and rural Colleges to ensure that health professionals from underrepresented populations are aware of research opportunities under this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A008) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A008) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
